section.section: The term of an appointed member is 4 years.
The terms of the appointed members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Commission on October 1, 2001.
At the end of a term, an appointed member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
